round_best: Develop a dynamic layer-sensitive adaptive compression method for KV caches in LLMs that uses reinforcement learning (RL) to optimize cache allocation across different layers. An RL agent can learn from the model inference patterns to allocate a variable KV budget to layers based on their sensitivity and contribution to performance metrics such as accuracy and speed. The RL approach would adjust in real time to changes in input complexity and model demands, thereby maximizing efficiency and minimizing costs.
